mil.emp3.api

Class LookAt

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.LookAt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILookAt, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition

    public class LookAt
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILookAt
    This class implemts a LookAt object which can be set on the map.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode

        org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LookAt()
      This default constructor creates a GeoLookAt.
      LookAt(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt lookAt)
      This constructor creates the LookAt with the IGeoLookAt encapsulated within.

        public LookAt()
        This default constructor creates a GeoLookAt.

      • LookAt

        public LookAt(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt lookAt)
        This constructor creates the LookAt with the IGeoLookAt encapsulated within.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • copySettingsFrom

        public void copySettingsFrom(ILookAt from)
        Description copied from interface: ILookAt
        This method copies all settings from the LookAt object provided. The settings copied are the coordinates, altitude, altitude mode, tilt, roll, range and azimuth.
        Specified by:
        copySettingsFrom in interface ILookAt
        Parameters:
        from - An object that implements the ILookAt interface.

      • addLookAtEventListener

        public EventListenerHandle addLookAtEventListener(ILookAtEventListener listener)
                                           throws EMP_Exception
        Description copied from interface: ILookAt
        This method adds an event listener to the LookAt.
        Specified by:
        addLookAtEventListener in interface ILookAt
        Parameters:
        listener - A reference to a class object that implements the ILookAtEventListener interface.
        Returns:
        The handle to the event registration. See EventListenerHandle
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception - if the listener is null.

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(EventListenerHandle listenerHandle)
        Description copied from interface: ILookAt
        This method must be used to remove the registration from the system.
        Specified by:
        removeEventListener in interface ILookAt
        Parameters:
        listenerHandle - The handle returned by the call to addLookAtEventListener. See EventListenerHandle

      • setTilt

        public void setTilt(double value)
        This method sets the tilt on the lookAt. If this lookAt is the current lookAt on any map, it will change the view on the map.
        Specified by:
        setTilt in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt
        Parameters:
        value - The tilt angle in degrees.

      • getTilt

        public double getTilt()
        This method retrieves the current tilt setting of the lookAt.
        Specified by:
        getTilt in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt
        Returns:
        The current tilt in degrees.

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(double heading)
        This method sets the lookAts heading. Setting this value on a lookAt that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setHeading in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt
        Parameters:
        heading - The new heading in degrees from north.

      • getHeading

        public double getHeading()
        This method retrieves the current azimuth from the lookAt.
        Specified by:
        getHeading in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoLookAt
        Returns:
        The azimuth in degrees from north.

      • setAltitudeMode

        public void setAltitudeMode(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode value)
        This method set the altitude mode for the elevation setting. Setting this value on a lookAt that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setAltitudeMode in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode
        Parameters:
        value - The new altitude mode. See IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode

      • setLatitude

        public void setLatitude(double value)
        This method sets the latitude of the lookAt position. Setting this value on a lookAt that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setLatitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Parameters:
        value - The latitude in degrees. The value must be -90.0 and 90 degrees. Values outside of this range are ignored.

      • getLatitude

        This method retrieves the current latitude from the lookAt.
        Specified by:
        getLatitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Returns:
        The current latitude in degrees.

      • setLongitude

        public void setLongitude(double value)
        This method sets the longitude of the lookAt position. Setting this value on a lookAt that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setLongitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Parameters:
        value - The longitude in degrees. The value must be -180.0 and 180.0 degrees. Values outside of this range are ignored.
